get.description: Gets airport and city ids for the car product best matched to the word that was entered searched using the `getCarAutoComplete` endpoint.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: Airport or City being searched.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Number passed is the maximum number of results returned.

parameters.name: get_airports
parameters.description: Include airports in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

parameters.name: get_cities
parameters.description: Include cities in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

parameters.name: get_airports_in_cities

post.description: Books a car reservation with a ppn_bundle and sends out an itinerary using the `getCarBookRequest` endpoint.

refid.description: Your unique Partner refid, used by PPN to attribute sales to the proper account.

site_refid.description: Your unique Partner refid, used by PPN to attribute sales to the proper account.

refclickid.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

remote_ip.description: Customer's IP address determined by your integration. Used by PPN for geo-location services and fraud prevention. Make sure you pass the customer's IP rather than your own. Currently only IPv4 addresses are accepted.

client_ip.description: Customer's IP address determined by your integration. Used by PPN for geo-location services and fraud prevention. Make sure you pass the customer's IP rather than your own. Currently only IPv4 addresses are accepted.

sid.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

ppn_bundle.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that identifies a specific rate.

cust_first_name.description: Customer's first name, could be same as driver_first_name.

street2.description: Used if customer has a P.O Box.

cc_type.description: Credit card type used for booking. Valid Options: AX (American Express), DS (Discover), MC (Master Card), Euro/Mastercard, VI (VISA)

cc_code.description: CVC code from the back of the credit card.

airline_code.description: 2 Letter code used to specify which airline that has been used.

cdw_selected.description: Collision Damage Insurance Selected. Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

pi_booking_id.description: If price increase occurred on a booking, resubmit with price increase booking id.

car_equipment_CSI.description: Special equipment - Infant car seat is requested.  Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

car_equipment_BST.description: Special equipment - Booster car seat is requested.  Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

car_equipment_NVS.description: Special equipment - Navigation system is requested.  Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

car_equipment_SKI.description: Special equipment - ski rack is requested.  Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

car_equipment_HCR.description: Special equipment - Hand controller left is requested.  Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

contract_initials.description: Initials of the Customer who's booking the rental car.

cdw_initials.description: Initials of the Customer who signs up for Collision Damage Insurance.

contract_archive.description: Priceline uses it exclusively, this is the location of the customer contract page.

aaa_member_id.description: The customer's unique id for our Partner's membership program. This value will be available in sales reports after a successful booking, and is useful for tracking member engagement.

member_id.description: The customer's unique id for our Partner's membership program. This value will be available in sales reports after a successful booking, and is useful for tracking member engagement.

newsletter_selected.description: Indicates if customer wants to subscribe to the email newsletter.

device_id.description: Device ID for sales tracking. Valid Options: 0 or 3 = Desktop , 1 = Mobile, 2 = Tablet, 4 = Phone.

device_type_id.description: Device type ID for sales tracking. Valid Options: 0 or 3 = Desktop , 1 = Mobile, 2 = Tablet, 4 = Phone.

itinerary_details.description: Whether you want the itinerary details in the response.

client_user_agent.description: The User-Agent header string from the customer's web browser or application.

refclickid3.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

upsell.description: If this was a product upsell, hotel, car, or air will be passed in a comma delimited list of products that were upsold.

sms_message_flag.description: When true, an sms application reads this flag in reservation to decide whether to send reminders to the registered phone number. The text on rezserver is as follows: "Hassle-free pick-up: Enter your cell number for a one-time SMS reminder of your confirmation number and counter details".

sms_opt_in_out.description: If the Customer has opted in in for sms notifications. Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

PCLN_SITESERVER.description: PCLN siteserver. This is used by rezserver.

platform.description: Platform used to make the booking Valid Options: 0 = Desktop, 1 = Mobile.

parameters.description: Customer's IP address determined by your integration. Used by PPN for geo-location services and fraud prevention. Make sure you pass the customer's IP rather than your own. Currently only IPv4 addresses are accepted.

parameters.name: ppn_bundle
parameters.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that identifies a specific rate.

parameters.name: cdw_quoted
parameters.description: JSON bundle that's returned from the quote function.

parameters.name: promotion_code
parameters.description: Code to receive results for a certain promotion

parameters.name: rate_code
parameters.description: Code to receive results for a certain rate

parameters.name: corp_discount_code
parameters.description: Alphanumeric id that specifies the discount provided by Corporations on contracts.

parameters.name: loyalty_member_id
parameters.description: The customer's loyalty number for the car company's membership program. This value will be sent to the car company at time of booking giving the customer access to perks, such as points or special rates.

parameters.name: client_user_agent
parameters.description: The User-Agent header string from the customer's web browser or application.
parameters.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_9_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/42.0.2311.90 Safari/537.36

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: legacy_mode
parameters.description: Whether legacy mode is enabled, which uses the old output structure. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: refclickid
parameters.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

parameters.name: car_reference_id
parameters.description: Support older version of bundling.

parameters.name: requested_currency
parameters.description: Currency Code to receive results only for that currency.

items.title: The Items Schema
items.example:
***U.S. CORPORATE LOCATIONS (GROUP 1)

PAYMENT OPTIONS:

TO QUALIFY TO RENT THE THRIFTY VEHICLE, THE RENTER MUST

PRESENT AT THE TIME OF RENTAL A VALID DRIVERS LICENSE

AND VALID MAJOR CREDIT CARD OR DEBIT CARD IN THE

RENTERS OWN NAME WITH AVAILABLE CREDIT. AT THE TIME OF

RENTAL, AN AUTHORIZED HOLD WILL BE SECURED ON YOUR

CREDIT/DEBIT CARD PROVIDED TO COVER THE ESTIMATED

RENTAL CHARGES AND ANY ADDITIONAL CHARGES THAT MAY BE

INCURRED. THESE FUNDS WILL NOT BE AVAILABLE FOR YOUR

USE. WE WILL PLACE AN AUTHORIZATION AMOUNT OF UP TO

USD 350.00 OR 15 PERCENT OF THE ESTIMATED RENTAL

CHARGES, DEPENDING ON RENTAL LOCATION AND CARD USED.

IF THRIFTY CANNOT SECURE CREDIT APPROVAL FOR THIS

AMOUNT AND/OR PROPER IDENTIFICATION CREDENTALS ARE NOT

SUPPLIED, THRIFTY WILL DECLINE YOUR RENTAL.

AT MANY LOCATIONS, DEBIT CARDS ISSUED UNDER A VISA,

MASTERCARD AND DISCOVER LOGO WHICH DRAW FUNDS DIRECTLY

FROM THE CARDHOLDERS ACCOUNT MAY BE USED AT THE OUTSET

OF A RENTAL TO QUALIFY FOR A RENTAL WHERE THE FOLLOWING

REQUIREMENTS ARE MET: AT THRIFTY AIRPORT LOCATIONS, YOU

WILL BE REQUIRED TO PROVIDE PROOF OF A RETURN AIRLINE

FLIGHT TO COINCIDE WITH THE RENTAL AND PRESENT TWO (2)

VALID FORMS OF IDENTIFICATION, AND AT THRIFTY OFF

AIRPORT LOCATIONS, YOU NEED TO BE AT LEAST 25 YEARS

OLD, PRESENT TWO (2) VALID FORMS OF IDENTIFICATION AND

ONE OF THE FOLLOWING: PROVIDE A CORPORATE DISCOUNT PLAN

(CDP) NUMBER OR PROOF OF A RETURN TRAVEL TICKET TO

COINCIDE WITH THE RENTAL (AIRLINE OR CRUISE). HOWEVER,

THERE ARE EXCEPTIONS TO THIS THRIFTY OFF AIRPORT

LOCATION POLICY: DEBIT CARDS ARE NOT ACCEPTED AT THE

OUTSET OF A RENTAL TO QUALIFY FOR RENTALS IN THE OFF

AIRPORT LOCATIONS IN NEW YORK METROPOLITAN TRI-STATE

AREA (NY, NJ, CT), AREAS OF HARTFORD, CT, AREAS OF

PHILADELPHIA, PA, AREAS OF BOSTON, MA, AREAS OF

MANCHESTER, NH, AREAS OF DETROIT, MI AND BALTIMORE, MD.

THERE ARE EXCEPTIONS TO THIS GENERAL POLICY: DEBIT

CARDS ARE ACCEPTED FOR THRIFTY BLUE CHIP MEMBERS WHEN

THE CARD IS ALREADY IN THE MEMBERS PROFILE OR THE

RENTAL IS A REPLACEMENT RENTAL. DEBIT CARDS ARE

ACCEPTED FOR PAYMENT AT THE END OF YOUR RENTAL. IN

MOST CASES, THE LOCATION WILL PERFORM A CREDIT CHECK

FOR DEBIT CARD CUSTOMERS TO DETERMINE CREDIT WORTHINESS

AT THE TIME OF RENTAL. THE CUSTOMER MUST MEET THE

MINIMUM CRITERIA TO RENT USING A DEBIT CARD.

CASH RENTALS WHICH REQUIRE AN UP-FRONT DEPOSIT OF CASH

ARE ACCEPTED FROM CUSTOMERS WHO HAVE OBTAINED A CASH

DEPOSIT IDENTIFICATION (ID) CARD. APPLICATIONS FOR A

CASH DEPOSIT ID CARD ARE AVAILABLE FROM THRIFTY.COM.

DEBIT CARD AND PREPAID OR STORE VALUE CARDS ARE

ACCEPTED FOR PAYMENT AT THE END OF YOUR RENTAL.

INCIDENTAL HOLD:

AT TIME OF RENTAL, CUSTOMERS PAYING WITH VISA AT ALL

LOCATIONS WILL HAVE 15 PERCENT OF THEIR ESTIMATED TOTAL

ADDED AS AN INCIDENTAL AMOUNT. CUSTOMERS RENTING IN

FLORIDA WILL HAVE A MINIMUM OF USD 250.00 ADDED TO

THEIR ESTIMATED TOTAL. THIS EXCLUDES CUSTOMERS PAYING

WITH A VISA CREDIT CARD. IF THE TOTAL IS GREATER THAN

USD 250.00, THE SYSTEM WILL CALCULATE 15 PERCENT OF THE

ESTIMATED TOTAL TO BE ADDED AS AN INCIDENTAL AMOUNT.

CUSTOMERS RENTING IN HAWAII WILL NOT HAVE A CREDIT CARD

INCIDENTAL AMOUNT ADDED TO THEIR ESTIMATED TOTAL. THIS

EXCLUDES RENTALS PAYING WITH A VISA CREDIT CARD, SEE

RULE 1. CUSTOMERS RENTING IN ALL OTHER STATES WILL

HAVE A MINIMUM OF USD 350.00 ADDED TO THEIR ESTIMATED

TOTAL. THIS EXCLUDES RENTALS PAYING WITH A VISA CREDIT

CARD, SEE RULE 1. IF THE TOTAL IS GREATER THAN

USD 350.00, THE SYSTEM WILL CALCULATE 15 PERCENT OF THE

ESTIMATED TOTAL TO BE ADDED AS AN INCIDENTAL AMOUNT.

THESE FUNDS WILL NOT BE AVAILABLE FOR YOUR USE.

DEFAULT: If you purchase collision damage coverage with this rental car reservation, you will be charged now for the coverage. Cancellations with 100% refund will be permitted for Collision Damage Coverage until your scheduled pick-up time.
Payment for this reservation is due when the car is returned and will be charged by Alamo Rent a Car.
Additional charges may apply at the counter if you pick up or drop off the car at a different date, time, or location than you requested for your reservation.
Only the driver will be able to pick up this rental car at the counter. An additional driver may be added at the counter for a fee payable directly to the rental car company.
Additional charges may apply for drivers under the age of 25.
Alamo Rent a Car will charge the driver at the rental counter for optional items you add to your reservation, including any child seats or special requests such as pre-paid fuel.

The driver will be required to present a valid driver's license and a valid credit card in his/her name at the counter for the refundable security deposit. Rental car companies may have different requirements for customers who will only have a debit card at the time of pick-up. For more specific information or to determine whether a debit card deposit is allowed, please review acceptable payment options in the partner's policy information. Pre-paid cards or cash will not be accepted for the security deposit.
Your car will be reserved for unlimited mileage, but some car companies have additional restrictions regarding mileage. Please refer to Alamo Rent a Car's specific policy.

Some states collect fees, or tolls, for access to certain roadways. Some tolls may be cashless and fees are paid via an electronic toll collection program. Alamo Rent a Car may have a specific policy regarding cashless tolls, or offer the option to participate in their electronic toll collection program. We recommend you speak to the counter agent upon arrival about whether this may affect you.
Please see location specific rental policy and rules information

items:
The following forms of payment are accepted at the end of the rental.

VISA
MasterCard
American Express
Discover Network
Debit Card
Prepaid Cards
Money Order

Additional authorizations from your account will be obtained to cover the cost of the rental charges. Alamo is not responsible for any overdraft fees incurred.

Minimum age to rent a vehicle is 21, except in NY and MI, where the minimum age to rent is 18. Rental rates may be higher for renters and additional drivers under the age of 25. Certain specialty and larger sized vehicles may not be available for rentals when the renter or additional driver is under 25.

YOUR ALAMO RENTAL WILL BE SERVICED BY NATIONAL CAR RENTAL, OUR DRIVE ALLIANCE PARTNER LOCATION. PLEASE FOLLOW SIGNS TO THE AIR TRAIN AND DEPART AT FEDERAL CIRCLE. PROCEED TO THE FIRST FLOOR MAKE A RIGHT AND GO TO THE NATIONAL RENTAL COUNTER.

Damage waiver DW for this branch is 11.99 per day. - DW is offered at the time of rental for an additional daily charge. If the renter accepts DW, Alamo waives or reduces the renters responsibility for loss of, or damage to, the rental vehicle including but not limited to towing, storage, loss of use, administrative fees and-or diminishment of value subject to the terms and conditions of the rental agreement and applicable laws. DW is not insurance. The purchase of DW is optional and not required to rent a car. The protection provided by DW may duplicate the renters existing coverage. Alamo is not qualified to evaluate the adequacy of the renters existing coverage- therefore the renter should examine his or her credit card protections, automobile insurance policies or other sources of coverage that may duplicate the protection provided by DW.

Deplaning passengers - debit cards are accepted at this airport location at the time of rental with proof of a confirmed round trip airline ticket disclosing a return date, and showing the renters name. A deposit for the cost of the rental will be taken and the funds will not be available for your use until after the vehicle has been returned. Renters using a debit card may not rent luxury or large SUV. License and debit card must be in the renters name.

Local customers - For renters living locally, a credit card is required and a deposit including an additional $250 more than the cost of the rental will be taken at the time of rental, and the funds will not be available for use until after the vehicle has been returned.

Additional drivers must meet same rental qualifications as the renter, except spouse or domestic partner. Additional drivers must appear at the rental counter with the primary renter. There will be an additional charge of $3 per day for each additional authorized driver other than a spouse or domestic partner, unless other contractual conditions apply. There is a limit of one additional driver per rental contract. A spouse or domestic partner is the only permitted additional driver on non-credit card deposit. Additional drivers must be 18 or older.

Mexican Insurance is sold at participating locations for customers authorized to travel into Mexico. 

For locations El Paso, New Mexico Airport, SUVs and Pickup Trucks are not allowed to travel to Mexico. 

For locations San Diego Airport, Premium Car and above, including Trucks, Cargo Vans, Hybrids, SUVs, Crossovers, and Convertibles are not allowed to travel to Mexico.

For locations Arizona Airport locations, Large Passenger Vans, Large SUVs, Large Pickup Trucks, and Luxury vehicles are not allowed to travel to Mexico.

For locations San Antionio, McAllen, Laredo and  Harlingen, there are no vehicle restrictions on travel to Mexico.

As a customer, you have a choice as to how you would like to pay for fuel.

Option 1 -  Prepay Fuel --This option allows the renter to pay for the full tank of gas at the time of rental and return the tank empty. No refunds will be issued for unused gas. 

Option 2 -  We Refill. --This option allows the renter to pay Alamo at the end of the rental for gas used but not replaced. Price per gallon will be higher than local fuel prices. 

Option 3 -  You Refill. --This option allows the renter to return the vehicle with a full tank of gas to avoid extra fuel charges.

All renters and additional drivers must be 18 or older and have a valid drivers license. Driver's licenses are accepted from any USA state or territory, from a Canadian province or from an international country. Licenses from outside the USA or Canada also may require an international driver's permit. International driver's permits are valid only if presented with the original local license. International renters require a valid passport; the name on the passport must match the name on the drivers license.  Individuals with learners permits are not eligible to rent. U.S. government employees ages 18 or older will not incur a young driver surcharge when renting for authorized government travel. 

AGE - 

The underage surcharge for drivers between the ages of 18 and 20 is $57 per day. Renters between the ages of 18 and 20 may rent the following vehicle classes: Economy through Intermediate cars. The underage surcharge for drivers between the ages of 21 and 24 is $20 per day. Renters between the ages of 21 and 24 may rent the following vehicle classes: Economy through Standard cars.

NON CREDIT CARD DEPOSITS  

Debit cards and money orders are accepted at the time of rental with a round trip travel ticket, e-ticket, or travel itinerary that shows the renters name and discloses the return date and port of entry. Renters using a debit card or money order as a deposit may not rent the following vehicle classes: Luxury, Large SUVs and Exotics.

Debit cards and money orders are also accepted at time of rental from non-deplaning customers. Reservations must be booked 72 hours in advance and the renter must qualify, in person, 48 hours prior to reservation by bringing in the following items (dated within the last 30 days and no past due balance): phone bill, utility bill and a pay stub in the renters name and with his or her current address. If a renter is not currently employed, he or she must also provide a current copy (dated within the last 30 days and no past due balance) of a second utility bill in the renters name and with his or her current address. The renters name and address on the documents must match their drivers license. Renters using a debit card or money order as a deposit may rent the following vehicle classes: Economy through Full Size cars, Compact SUVs and Intermediate SUVs.

DEPOSIT AMOUNT  

For renters deplaning and using a credit or debit card, a deposit equal to the cost of the rental will be taken at the time of rental. For renters deplaning and using a money order, a deposit including an additional $500 more than the cost of the rental will be taken at time of rental. For non-deplaning renters using a credit card, a deposit including an additional $250 more than the cost of the rental will be taken at time of rental. For non-deplaning renters using a debit card or money order, a deposit including an additional $500 more than the cost of the rental will be taken at time of rental. For customers renting Exotic or Luxury class vehicles, a deposit including an additional $1000 more than the cost of the rental will be taken at time of rental. The renter must also provide proof of full coverage insurance policy in their name and the deposit must be held on a credit card. Cash and prepaid cards are not acceptable methods of deposit. This location is not responsible for any overdraft fees incurred.

A VALID DRIVERS LICENSE IN THE CUSTOMERS OWN NAME MUST

BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF PICK-UP.

INTERNATIONAL RENTERS MUST PRESENT A VALID LICENSE FROM

THEIR COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE. AN INTERNATIONAL DRIVING

PERMIT (IDP) IS STRONGLY RECOMMENDED FOR A DRIVERS

LICENSE THAT IS IN A LANGUAGE OTHER THAN ENGLISH.

RENTERS WITH DRIVERS LICENSES ISSUED OUTSIDE OF THE

UNITED STATES MUST PROVIDE A VALID PASSPORT. LEARNER

PERMITS OR PHOTOCOPIES ARE NOT ACCEPTED.

FLORIDA DRIVERS LICENSE:

IF A PERSON RENEWS THEIR FLORIDA DRIVERS LICENSE, THEY

ARE NOT ALLOWED TO KEEP OR USE THEIR EXPIRED DRIVERS

LICENSE. THEY ARE ISSUED A RECEIPT OF PAPER FROM THE

DMV TO PROVE THEY HAVE RENEWED THEIR LICENSE AND ARE

WAITING ON THEIR NEW DRIVERS LICENSE. THIS RECEIPT OF

PAPER WILL EXPIRE IN 30 DAYS, THE RECEIPT IS DATED AND

THE LOCATION WILL RUN THE FLORIDA DRIVERS LICENSE THRU

THE DMV. THE LOCATION WILL ACCEPT THE RECEIPT AS A

VALID DRIVERS LICENSE.

*** U.S. CORPORATE LOCATIONS ***

ONE WAY RENTALS MAY INCLUDE CAPPED MILEAGE ON RATES

DESIGNATED FOR ONE WAY SERVICE. ONE WAY RENTALS MUST

BE BOOKED IN ADVANCE. NOT ALL VEHICLES ARE AVAILABLE

FOR ONE WAY SERVICE. RENTERS USING THEIR CORPORATE

ACCOUNT RATE WILL RECEIVE THEIR APPLICABLE MILEAGE,

WHETHER CAPPED OR UNLIMITED. ONE WAY RENTALS MAY BE

SUBJECT TO A DROP CHARGE AND WHEN APPLICABLE, WILL

BE DISPLAYED UPON CONFIRMATION.

*** BLUE CHIP EXPRESS RENTAL PROGRAM ***

A FREE AND CONVENIENT SERVICE THAT MAXIMIZES YOUR DAY

BY MINIMIZING THE TIME YOU SPEND IN LINE. THRIFTY WILL

PERSONALIZE THE RENTAL PROCESS FOR YOU. WHEN BOOKING,

INCLUDE YOUR BLUE CHIP NUMBER IN THE APPROPRIATE PLACE.

FOR MORE INFORMATION OR TO ENROLL, SEE WWW.THRIFTY.COM

OR CALL 1-888-400-8877. IF YOU NEED ASSISTANCE BOOKING

A BLUE CHIP RESERVATION, PLEASE CALL 1-800-847-4389.

*** U.S. CORPORATE LOCATIONS

LIABILITY INSURANCE SUPPLEMENT (LIS) PRODUCT IS

OPTIONAL AND PROVIDES UP TO $1,000,000 ($2,000,000 IN

CA AND FL FOR LIABILITY ONLY) OF LIABILITY COVERAGE FOR

CLAIMS MADE AGAINST YOU BY THIRD-PARTIES FOR BODILY

INJURY AND/OR PROPERTY DAMAGE. THIS PRODUCT PROVIDES

$1,000,000 OF UNINSURED/UNDERINSURED MOTORIST COVERAGE.

LIS FEE VARIES BETWEEN $12.34 AND $18.85 DEPENDING ON

THE LOCATION AND THE STATE.

GENERAL LIABILITY-

IF RENTING IN MARYLAND, MASSACHUSETTS, MICHIGAN, NEW

YORK, SOUTH CAROLINA, VIRGINIA OR WEST VIRGINIA- UPON

SIGNING THE RENTAL AGREEMENT, THRIFTY PROVIDES PRIMARY

LIABILITY PROTECTION. HOWEVER, SUCH PROTECTION IS

GENERALLY NOT HIGHER THAN THE MINIMUM LIMITS REQUIRED

BY INDIVIDUAL STATE LAW.

IF RENTING IN CALIFORNIA- THRIFTY PROVIDES NO LIABILITY

UNDER THE TERMS OF THE RENTAL AGREEMENT TO THE RENTER

FROM CLAIMS OF INJURY BY OTHERS AGAINST YOU RESULTING

FROM AN ACCIDENT. YOUR PERSONAL/BUSINESS INSURANCE MAY

COVER YOUR LIABILITY. EXCEPTIONS- THRIFTY WILL PROVIDE

PRIMARY PROTECTION UP TO THE STATUTORY MINIMUM LIMITS

TO INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS (IF DRIVERS LICENSE

INDICATES AN ADDRESS OUTSIDE OF THE U.S. AND RENTING IN

CALIFORNIA).

IF RENTING IN ANY OTHER STATE IN THE U.S.- THRIFTY

LIABILITY PROTECTION IS SECONDARY TO ANY OTHER

INSURANCE COVERAGE AVAILABLE TO YOU. IF YOU DO NOT

HAVE LIABILITY INSURANCE AND/OR THE LIMITS OF LIABILITY

OF THE INSURANCE COVERAGE AVAILABLE TO YOU ARE NOT

SUFFICIENT TO COVER THE CLAIMS BY OTHERS MADE AGAINST

YOU, AND THRIFTY, AS THE VEHICLE OWNER, PROVIDES

LIABILITY PROTECTION DUE TO AN ACCIDENT, YOU WILL

INDEMNIFY THRIFTY FOR ANY AND ALL PAYMENTS MADE.

PLEASE SEE OPTIONAL LIABILITY INSURANCE SUPPLEMENT

PRODUCT OFFERED AT THE TIME OF YOUR RENTAL WHICH IS

PRIMARY LIABILITY PROTECTION.

*** U.S. CORPORATE LOCATIONS

*******************************************************

PLEASE NOTE: FOR EXPEDIA CUSTOMERS BOOKING FROM

AUSTRALIA AND NEW ZEALAND, YOUR RATE WILL BE INCLUSIVE

OF UNLIMITED MILEAGE, LDW, SLI, UMP, CFC, HSF, TAXES

AND FEES.

*******************************************************

MAKES/MODELS ARE EXAMPLES ONLY AND ARE NOT GUARANTEED.

ANY CHANGES TO YOUR RESERVATION OR RENTAL MAY RESULT IN

A CHANGE OF RATE OR ADDITIONAL FEES. FOR RENTALS OF 30

DAYS OR LONGER, THE CUSTOMER MUST RETURN THE VEHICLE

FOR MAINTENANCE OR TO RENEW THE CONTRACT EVERY 30 DAYS

TO THE LOCATION.

*** VEHICLE HOLD POLICY ***

RESERVATIONS WILL BE HONORED FOR 6 HOURS AFTER ORIGINAL

SCHEDULED PICK UP TIME AT AIRPORT LOCATIONS (2 HOURS AT

NON-AIRPORT LOCATIONS) UNLESS THE LOCATION IS CLOSED.

CUSTOMERS WITH RESERVATIONS WHO EXPERIENCE WEATHER OR

MECHANICAL DELAYS WITH AIRLINES WILL BE ACCOMMODATED.

*** GEOGRAPHIC DRIVING RESTRICTIONS ***

DRIVING IS RESTRICTED TO THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES

AND CANADA. PLEASE ADVISE THE RENTAL COUNTER UPON YOUR

ARRIVAL IF YOU INTEND TO CROSS THE CANADIAN BORDER AND

RETURN TO THE RENTING LOCATION. WHEN DRIVING INTO

CANADA, YOU WILL NEED A COPY OF YOUR RENTAL AGREEMENT

AND MUST PROVIDE A VALID PASSPORT. VEHICLES MUST BE

RETURNED TO THE LOCATION FROM WHICH THEY WERE RENTED,

UNLESS PRIOR AUTHORIZATION HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE RENTAL

CAR COMPANY AT THE TIME OF THE RESERVATION THAT THE

VEHICLE CAN BE RETURNED TO A DIFFERENT LOCATION.

VEHICLES ARE NOT ALLOWED INTO MEXICO. NO OFF-ROAD

DRIVING IS PERMITTED. THERE ARE SOME EXCEPTIONS TO

THESE DRIVING RESTRICTIONS, DEPENDING ON THE LOCATION.

PLEASE INQUIRE AT THE RENTAL COUNTER FOR INFORMATION.

*** FREQUENT FLYER SURCHARGE ***

WHEN THE RENTER CHOOSES TO RECEIVE FREQUENT FLYER

MILES, WE WILL COLLECT A FREQUENT FLYER SURCHARGE,

NOT TO EXCEED $1.50 PER DAY, AT TIME OF RENTAL, TO

OFFSET A PORTION OF THE ANNUAL COST OF PARTICIPATION

IN THE FREQUENT FLYER PROGRAM.

*** GOVERNMENT RATE SUPPLEMENT ***

WHEN TRAVELING ON OFFICIAL U.S. GOVERNMENT BUSINESS,

THE RENTER WILL BE CHARGED A STANDARD MANDATORY

GOVERNMENT ADMINISTRATIVE RATE SUPPLEMENT (GARS) OF

$5.00 PER DAY IN ADDITION TO THE RATES LISTED.

*** EARLY RETURN FEE ***

IF A CUSTOMER RETURNS THE VEHICLE MORE THAN 24 HOURS

EARLY THAN THE REGULAR RETURN TIME, AN EARLY RETURN

FEE WILL APPLY.

*** NON-SMOKING VEHICLES ***

THIS LOCATION NOW HAS A NON-SMOKING POLICY AND CARRIES

ONLY NON-SMOKING VEHICLES. RENTERS WHO DO NOT COMPLY

WITH THE NEW POLICY AND RETURN VEHICLES AFTER SMOKING

MAY FACE A CHARGE OF UP TO $250.00.

*** PLATEPASS ***

PLEASE NOTE: THERE ARE TOLL ROADS WITHIN THIS AREA THAT

HAVE CONVERTED OR WILL BE CONVERTING TO ALL-ELECTRONIC

TOLLING OR CASHLESS TOLLING. IN THESE AREAS, THERE IS

NO OPTION FOR A RENTAL CAR TO STOP AND PAY THE TOLLS IN

CASH. IF YOUR TRAVELS WILL TAKE YOU ON A TOLL ROAD IN

AN AREA WHERE THERE IS NO OPTION TO STOP AND PAY CASH

FOR THE TOLLS, PLATEPASS IS THE PERFECT SOLUTION. IN

AREAS WHERE TOLL ROADS HAVE CONVERTED TO ALL-ELECTRONIC

TOLLING OR CASHLESS TOLLING, YOU SHOULD CHECK WITH THE

TOLLING AUTHORITY FOR OTHER AVAILABLE PAYMENT OPTIONS.

IF YOUR CHOOSE NOT TO SELECT THE PLATEPASS PRE-PAID

TOLLING OPTION AND TRAVEL ON ONE OF THESE ALL-

ELECTRONIC TOLL ROADS AND DO NOT HAVE YOUR OWN TOLLING

DEVICE IN THE VEHICLE, THE APPLICABLE TOLL WILL BE PAID

FOR YOU AND AN ADMINISTRATIVE FEE OF USD 15.00 PER

OCCURRENCE (FLORIDA LOCATIONS USD 9.99 PER OCCURRENCE),

WITH A MAXIMUM OF USD 90.00 PER RENTAL TRANSACTION WILL

BE CHARGED.

ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE-

PREMIUM EMERGENCY ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE *PERS* IS AN

OPTIONAL USD 8.99 PER DAY. PERS, IF ACCEPTED, REDUCES

YOUR FINANCIAL LIABILITY FOR SERVICES REQUIRED TO

REMEDY NON-MECHANICAL PROBLEMS OF THE VEHICLE AND/OR

PROBLEMS RESULTING FROM AN ACCIDENT OR COLLISION.

** U.S. CORPORATE LOCATIONS **

PERSONAL PROTECTION PLAN (PPP) IS OPTIONAL. DETAILS

ARE AVAILABLE AT THE RENTAL COUNTER.

NEW YORK CORPORATE LOCATIONS:

COST OF PPP IS USD 2.95 PER DAY.

ALL OTHER CORPORATE LOCATIONS:

COST OF PPP IS USD 6.99 PER DAY.

*** U.S. CORPORATE LOCATIONS ***

CUSTOMERS WHO DO NOT PURCHASE OUR REFUELING OPTION MUST

REFILL THE VEHICLE WITHIN A 10 MILE RADIUS OF THE

RENTAL RETURN FACILITY AND PRESENT A FUEL RECEIPT TO

AVOID REFUELING CHARGES.

PICK UP INFORMATION:

UPON ARRIVAL PLEASE FOLLOW THE SIGNS TO THE AIR TRAIN.

PLEASE TAKE THE AIR TRAIN TO FEDERAL CIRCLE RENT A CAR.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR BUSINESS AND WELCOME TO NEW YORK.

*** CORPORATE LOCATIONS ***

ADDITIONAL DRIVERS:

ADDITIONAL DRIVERS MUST QUALIFY WITH A VALID DRIVERS

LICENSE IN THEIR OWN NAME.

ADDITIONAL DRIVER FEE:

ADDITIONAL CHARGES MAY APPLY.

TAXES FEES SURCHARGES NOT INCLUDED IN BASE RENTAL RATE.

* SALES TAX IS 8.875 PERCENT PER RENTAL.

* RENTAL TAX IS 11.0 PERCENT PER RENTAL.

* CONCESSION RECOVERY FEE IS 14.29 PERCENT PER RENTAL.

* CONCESSION RECOVERY SURCHARGE IS USD .50 PER DAY.

* VEHICLE LICENSE FEE IS USD 2.50 PER DAY.

SEE *OTH* (OTHER) FOR FREQUENT FLYER SURCHARGE AND

GOVERNMENT ADMINISTRATIVE RATE SUPPLEMENT (GARS).

C#

post.description: Looks up and returns all the information for a booked car reservation using the `getCarLookUp` lookup.

sid.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

refid.description: Your unique Partner refid, used by PPN to attribute sales to the proper account.

booking_id.description: The booking_id returned by the Book endpoint. Must be used with `email` or `access_code` and `email`.

email.description: Customer's email address to be associated with the booking. We'll use this email address for sending transaction email such as confirmations and cancellations.

client_user_agent.description: The User-Agent header string from the customer's web browser or application.
client_user_agent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_9_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/42.0.2311.90 Safari/537.36

lookup_version.description: Determines what version of the output is returned.

legacy_mode.description: Whether legacy mode is enabled, which uses the old output structure. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

postsale_insurance_quote.description: Used to request a post-sale insurance offering. When active, endpoint will return the values and html to display for an insurance offer. Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes

page_type.description: This indicates whether the page being loaded is a confirmation or reservation lookup page.  Valid Options: Confirmation or Lookup

client_ip.description: Customer's IP address determined by your integration. Used by PPN for geo-location services and fraud prevention. Make sure you pass the customer's IP rather than your own. Currently only IPv4 addresses are accepted.

shuttle_text.title: The Shuttle_text Schema
shuttle_text.example: *GENERAL DIRECTIONS* Airline passengers go to baggage claim. AIRLINE PASSENGERS There is NO counter located in the Arrival Terminals. ALL CUSTOMERS must take the Air Train to Station C/Federal Circle. The Avis counter is approx 50 yds. CARS: Located at the Car Rental Facility. RETURNS: Follow signs that say "Car Rental Return". AFTER-HOURS RETURNS: Open 24 hours. Local renters go to car lot. WALK-UP RENTERS Follow airport signs for Rental Car Return. They will lead to the Avis car rental lot. AFTER-HOURS RETURNS Accepted Park & lock the car. Place the completed contract & the keys in the key drop box. Remember to take your personal belongings with you. PREFERRED SERVICE Non-Bussing Location AIRLINE PASSENGERS There is NO counter located in the Arrival Terminals. ALL CUSTOMERS must take the Air Train to Terminal C. The Air Train will take you to the car rental facility. Select & Go Location Upon arrival at the rental facility, check your email on your smartphone or the Preferred board for the space number of your preassigned vehicle. You have the option to accept the preassigned car or exchange it for a similar car from the Select & Go Exchange Area or upgrade the car to a specialty vehicle from the Select & Go Upgrade Area. Cars in the Select & Go Upgrade Area have the additional daily cost posted on the hangtag. Once you have selected your vehicle, drive the vehicle to the exit booth and present your driver's license to the Avis representative who will quickly complete the transaction and get you on your way.

postsale_insurance.html:
Rental Insurance $9/day

Coverage may cost less now than at the rental car counter

  • Can cover costs if your rental car is stolen or damaged in an accident or while left unattended
  • Provided as primary coverage no deductible
  • Toll-free, 24-hour emergency hotline help included
text_block: Coverage may cost less now than at the rental car counter
Can cover costs if your rental car is stolen or damaged in an accident or while left unattendedProvided as primary coverage  no deductibleToll-free, 24-hour emergency hotline help included

important_information.title: Payment
important_information.text: We recommend that you print a copy of this page and present it at the rental car counter to simplify the pick-up process.
Payment for this reservation is due when the car is returned and will be charged by Avis Rent a Car.
Additional charges may apply at the counter if you pick up or drop off the car at a different date, time, or location than you requested for your reservation.

important_information.title: Driver
important_information.text: Only the driver will be able to pick up this rental car at the counter. An additional driver may be added at the counter for a fee payable directly to the rental car company.
Additional charges may apply for drivers under the age of 25.
Avis Rent a Car will charge the driver at the rental counter for optional items you add to your reservation, including any child seats or special requests such as pre-paid fuel.

important_information.title: Identification
important_information.text: The driver will be required to present a valid driver's license and a valid credit card in his/her name at the counter for the refundable security deposit. Rental car companies may have different requirements for customers who will only have a debit card at the time of pick-up, such as multiple forms of identification, age restrictions, or proof of round-trip airline travel. For more specific information or to determine whether a debit card deposit is allowed, please review acceptable payment options in the partner's policy information.  Pre-paid cards or cash will not be accepted for the security deposit.

If you are renting locally, please review the location specific rental policy for potential additional restrictions. Qualifying a local renter varies by rental company, but they will typically use the address on your license, or the issuing state of your license, to determine locality.

important_information.title: Mileage
important_information.text: Your car will be reserved for unlimited mileage, but some car companies have additional restrictions regarding mileage. Please refer to Avis Rent a Car's specific policy.

Some states collect fees, or tolls, for access to certain roadways. Some tolls may be cashless and fees are paid via an electronic toll collection program. Avis Rent a Car may have a specific policy regarding cashless tolls, or offer the option to participate in their electronic toll collection program. We recommend you speak to the counter agent upon arrival about whether this may affect you.
Please see location specific #START_ANCHOR_RENTALPOLICYANDRULES#rental policy and rules information#END_ANCHOR_RENTALPOLICYANDRULES#.

If you have any questions or require further assistance, please visit the customer help area on our website. You may also contact our Customer Service Department by phone at +1 877-477-7441 (when calling from United States). Please have your Trip Number 100-167-902-89 and the phone number you provided when you placed your request +1 917-526-3562 ready when you call.
You hereby agree to abide by our #START_ANCHOR_TERMSANDCONDITIONS#terms and conditions#END_ANCHOR_TERMSANDCONDITIONS# and #START_ANCHOR_PRIVACYPOLICY#privacy policy#END_ANCHOR_PRIVACYPOLICY#.

car_policy_data.title: Additional Fees
car_policy_data.description: A frequent flyer surcharge of up to $1.00 per day applies to all rentals earning frequent flyer miles, points or credits.

car_policy_data.title: Debit Card Policies
car_policy_data.description:
This location does accept bank debit cards with the MasterCard or Visa logo at the time of rental if you have arrived by air into the metro area. The renter must present a return airline ticket with a return date at the time of rental. If the renter does not have a return airline ticket, a debit card cannot be used. The renter must be at least 25 years of age. Currently, at all U.S. and Canada locations, debit cards are not acceptable as credit identification at the time of rental for all makes and models identified in the Avis Specialty or Signature Series and for certain other premium vehicles. You will be subject to a credit check to determine and ensure credit worthiness before releasing the car to you.

If you fail to return the vehicle as agreed, Avis will obtain additional authorizations from your account to cover the rental charges.

Avis is not responsible for any returned checks or over-drafts based on this policy.

Positive identification in addition to your driver's license may be required.

In the United States, Debit, Cash or Check cards can be used at the end for payment of rental charges. For acceptable credit identification and payment methods in countries outside of the United States, please consult the Renter's Guide and search for the specific location.

Note: Prepaid Debit/Gift cards are not acceptable methods of credit identification to pick up a car at any location. One of the above mentioned cards must be presented. Prepaid Debit/Gift cards are accepted at time of return only.



Avis will generally request an authorization hold against your account for the estimated charges of the rental but reserves the right at its sole discretion to request extra valule based on certain factors as we deem appropriate. When the rental is over we will process the reversal but the bank may take time to post it back to the account.

When the rental is over we will process the reversal but the bank may take time to post it back to the account.

car_policy_data.title: Drivers License
car_policy_data.description:
At time of pick-up, driver must present a valid, U.S.-issued driver's license and credit card (or debit card at participating locations) in the driver's name. If the driver's license is not issued in the U.S., you must present your drivers license and either a passport or a Canadian enhanced license in the driver's name.

Restrictions

Customers who are renting (reservation, walkup or upsell) an Avis Signature Series (all Group X vehicles) and presents a non-U.S. issued driver's license along with a U.S. address during the qualification process will also be required to produce a non-U.S. issued passport from the same country identified on the driver's license that is presented.

Renters presenting a driver's license from Mali or Cameroon who wish to rent a vehicle other than car groups A-E MUST also present an International Driver's Permit and a valid passport from the same country identified on the driver's license. These renters WILL also be required to present a secondary form of credit identification to complete the rental process.

car_policy_data.title: Credit Card Policies
car_policy_data.description:
Avis accepts most major credit cards as credit identification at the time of rental. The renters name must be on the credit card. NOTE: Specialty or Signature Series Vehicles - 2 CREDIT CARDS in the renters name are required to rent ALL Specialty or Signature Series Vehicles.

Accepted credit card list: Avis Charge Card, American Express, AT&T Capital, Diner's Club Int'l, Discover, China UnionPay, GE Capital, JCB, MasterCard, PHH, Sears and Visa.

Some locations may not accept each of the referenced cards.

At the time of rental, we will request an authorization on your charge card for the estimated rental charges. While this hold is in place, the funds will not be available for your use. When the rental is over, we will process the reversal, but the bank may take time to post it back to the account.

car_policy_data.title: Optional Coverages
car_policy_data.description:
Acceptance of the Loss Damage Waiver relieves the renter and authorized additional drivers of responsibility for loss of, or damage to the Avis car, when they comply with the terms and conditions listed on the rental document jacket. At the time of rental, the customer must initial whether he/she accepts or declines the LDW and optional services. LDW and optional services must be signed for at the rental counter.

LDW is taxable.

If LDW is not accepted, the customer is financially responsible for the full value of:

Accident damage

Glass damage

Stolen items (radio, battery, etc.)

Vandalism

Theft of the car

Exceptions:

In Wisconsin, if LDW is not accepted, the renter is liable for all loss or damage to the Avis car due to an accident or reckless, wanton behavior.

In Illinois, if LDW is not accepted, the customer is financially responsible for the following types of damage, up to a maximum of $16,000.00 for rentals :

Accident damage

Glass damage

Stolen items (radio, battery, etc.)

Vandalism

Theft of the car

Canceling LDW

Once LDW has been purchased, it must remain on the contract. The customer has the option to return the car & close the rental agreement; however, this could change the rate for the rental agreement and a different, possibly higher, rate could apply for a new rental.

Exceptions:

Customers who rent in New York and purchase LDW in New York can decide to cancel this service at no charge, within specific guidelines:

Rental must be 2 days or more.

The cancellation must be within the first 24 hours of the rental.

The actual renter must take the car to an Avis location for inspection & must sign a cancellation notice.

Loss of Use

The customer may also be responsible for reimbursing Avis for the revenue lost by not being able to use the car while it is being repaired or not recovered due to theft (referred to as Loss of Use).

Global insurance coverages are always subject to change. Please verify at time of rental.

car_policy_data.title: Travel Into Other Countries
car_policy_data.description:
Vehicles at this location can be driven throughout the continental U.S. with no restrictions. Based on availability, one-way rentals may be allowed to some U.S. cities.

Vehicles may be driven into Canada with no restrictions. The rental counter must be notified at the time of rental that you plan to drive into Canada so we may issue a Canadian Non-Resident Insurance Card (provided at not cost). Based on availability, one-way rentals may be allowed to some Canada cities. Vehicles at this location are not allowed into Mexico.

car_policy_data.title: Towing
car_policy_data.description: Towing is not permitted. Vehicles cannot be used to tow or push anything.  A trailer hitch cannot be installed on the vehicles.

car_policy_data.title: Shuttle Service
car_policy_data.description:
*GENERAL DIRECTIONS*

Airline passengers go to baggage claim.

AIRLINE PASSENGERS There is NO counter located in the Arrival Terminals. ALL CUSTOMERS must take the Air Train to Station C/Federal Circle. The Avis counter is approx 50 yds. CARS: Located at the Car Rental Facility. RETURNS: Follow signs that say "Car Rental Return". AFTER-HOURS RETURNS: Open 24 hours.

Local renters go to car lot.

WALK-UP RENTERS Follow airport signs for Rental Car Return. They will lead to the Avis car rental lot.

AFTER-HOURS RETURNS

Accepted

Park & lock the car. Place the completed contract & the keys in the key drop box. Remember to take your personal belongings with you.

PREFERRED SERVICE

Non-Bussing Location

AIRLINE PASSENGERS There is NO counter located in the Arrival Terminals. ALL CUSTOMERS must take the Air Train to Terminal C. The Air Train will take you to the car rental facility.

Select & Go Location

Upon arrival at the rental facility, check your email on your smartphone or the Preferred board for the space number of your preassigned vehicle. You have the option to accept the preassigned car or exchange it for a similar car from the Select & Go Exchange Area or upgrade the car to a specialty vehicle from the Select & Go Upgrade Area. Cars in the Select & Go Upgrade Area have the additional daily cost posted on the hangtag. Once you have selected your vehicle, drive the vehicle to the exit booth and present your driver's license to the Avis representative who will quickly complete the transaction and get you on your way.

car_policy_data.title: Age
car_policy_data.description:
In the state of New York the minimum age is 18 with a $52 surcharge per day for renters age 18-20 or a $35 surcharge per day for renters age 21-24.

Additionally, the following restrictions also will apply for renters between the ages of 21-24: Renters of luxury cars, mini-vans, 12-passenger vans, specialty cars, full-size SUVs and premium SUVs will not be permitted.

Government Minimum Age Policy - Military (Fema, US Postal Dept.,Navy and Army) and Civilian Personnel

Minimum age - 18 years (No underage surcharge will apply) with government Travel or Purchase order

Minimum age - 18 years (Underage surcharge will apply) no travel or purchase order

get.description: Re-sends the email itinerary of a booked car reservation using the `getCarResendItinerary` endpoint.

parameters.name: site_refid
parameters.description: Your unique Partner refid, used by PPN to attribute sales to the proper account.

parameters.name: refclickid
parameters.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: booking_id
parameters.description: The booking_id returned by the Book endpoint. Must be used with `email` or `access_code` and `email`.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Customer's email address to be associated with the booking. We'll use this email address for sending transaction email such as confirmations and cancellations.

parameters.name: cdw_failed
parameters.description: If Collision Damage insurance was offered but refused.  Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

parameters.name: lookup_version
parameters.description: Determines what version of the output is returned.

parameters.name: legacy_mode
parameters.description: Whether legacy mode is enabled, which uses the old output structure. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: data_for_admin_email
parameters.description: Contains all the information returned from get car lookup.

parameters.name: subject_add_admin
parameters.description: Add "Admin Email" to the subject line of email to differentiate.

parameters.name: send_to_email
parameters.description: Destination email address for the new itinerary.

getCarResendItinerary.description: The standard response from the server

status_code.description:
Error Codes

Status Code Message
2.213.1 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid refid provided.
2.213.2 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid SID.
2.213.3 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid Book ID.
2.213.4 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid Email.
2.213.5 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid value for cdw_failed.
2.213.6 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid value for lookup_version.
2.213.7 Car.ResendItinerary: Could not retrieve reservation.
2.213.8 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid value for legacy_mode.
2.213.9 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid data_for_admin_email.
2.213.10 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid subject_add_admin.
2.213.11 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid send_to_email.
2.213.12 Car.ResendItinerary: Invalid refclickid.

get.description: Lists the available cars that you can book during the date range provided using the `getCarResultsV3` endpoint.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: pickup_code
parameters.description: The pick up airport or city code (pickup_airport_code and pick up_city_id take precedence if defined).

parameters.name: pickup_counters
parameters.description: Car pick up country code.

parameters.name: pickup_cityid
parameters.description: The city ID where the car is picked up.

parameters.name: pickup_city
parameters.description: The search string of city to search for.

parameters.name: pickup_state
parameters.description: Car pickup state code.

parameters.name: pickup_country
parameters.description: Car pick up country code.

parameters.name: pickup_lat_long
parameters.description: The pick up by latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: pickup_time
parameters.description: The car pickup time in style of (HH:mm:ss).

parameters.name: dropoff_code
parameters.description: The car drop off airport or city code (pickup_airport_code and pick up_city_id take precedence if defined).

parameters.name: dropoff_cityid
parameters.description: The city ID where the car is droped off.

parameters.name: pickup_date
parameters.description: The car pickup date in style of (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY).

parameters.name: dropoff_date
parameters.description: The car drop off date in style of (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY).

parameters.name: dropoff_time
parameters.description: The car drop off time in style of (HH:mm:ss).

parameters.name: dropoff_lat_long
parameters.description: The drop off by latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: site_refid
parameters.description: Your unique Partner refid, used by PPN to attribute sales to the proper account.

parameters.name: refclickid
parameters.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

parameters.name: remote_ip
parameters.description: Customer's IP address determined by your integration. Used by PPN for geo-location services and fraud prevention. Make sure you pass the customer's IP rather than your own. Currently only IPv4 addresses are accepted.

parameters.name: car_change_bundle
parameters.description: A bundle code used to cancel the accompanying reservation.

parameters.name: chg_car_type
parameters.description: A list of car types separated by commas to change.

parameters.name: chg_pickup_date
parameters.description: The changed car pick up date in style of (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY).

parameters.name: chg_pickup_time
parameters.description: The changed car pick up time in style of (HH:mm:ss).

parameters.name: chg_dropoff_date
parameters.description: The changed car drop off date in style of (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY).

parameters.name: chg_dropoff_time
parameters.description: The changed car drop off time in style of (HH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: driver_age
parameters.description: Driver's age.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: prepaid_rates
parameters.description: Include cities in search results.

parameters.name: filter_company_codes
parameters.description: A list of company codes. Defined by adding filter_company_codes[]=x to the query parameters for each company code.

parameters.name: filter_car_type
parameters.description: A list of car types seperated by commas.

parameters.name: filter_transmission
parameters.description: Car transmission type (Automatic/Manual).

parameters.name: discount_company_code
parameters.description: Company Code for the discount code.

parameters.name: discount_cd
parameters.description: Corporate discount code.

parameters.name: discount_cd2
parameters.description: Corporate discount code.

parameters.name: discount_pc
parameters.description: Promotional discount code.

parameters.name: discount_rc
parameters.description: Rate discount code.

parameters.name: batch_discount
parameters.description: A combined version of discount_cd, discount_pc, and discount_rc for list of discount codes. Defined by batch_discount[your_company_code][cd|pc|rc]=your_discount_code.

parameters.name: activate_campaign
parameters.description: Activates the refid's available compaign. 0 or 1.

parameters.name: campaign_only
parameters.description: A 0 or 1 to show only refid's available campaign.

parameters.name: abg_enabled
parameters.description: An alias for activate_campaign and campaign_only. If set to 1, then simply enables both those flags.  Valid Options: 0 or 1.

parameters.name: search_radius
parameters.description: The search radius in miles to return results from.

getCarResultsV3.title: Response Object
getCarResultsV3.description: The standard response from the server

status_code.description:
Error Codes

Status Code Message
774 Car Results (pickup_code cannot be blank)
775 Car Results (no pickup_code match)
776 Car Results (no dropoff_code match)
777 Car Results (pickup or dropoff must be an airport code)
778 Car Results (no results received)
1024 Car Results Suggestions (could not find match for pickup/dropoff)
1026 Car Results (availability search not made)
1027 Car Results (invalid pickup/dropoff time)
1028 Car Results (invalid date format)
1029 Car Results (empty results)
1111 Car Inventory (none active)
